thread.title: Booking software issue with Booking.com
thread.title_full: Booking software issue with Booking.com - Review of Park Lane Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Brenda_McK_LaMont
title: Booking software issue with Booking.com
text: I made a reservation for 4 nights 8 months in advance thru Booking .com. Software issues created wrong booking and $1490 fees to cancel 2 days later for stay over 8 months away. The hotel was not helpful or nice about about cancelling this reservation that was booked as a no fee cancellation. Their phone system took 3 days to get thru and about 15 phone calls to talk to a manager that was not helpful or pleasant. I would never use booking .com or any of their affiliates to book a room ever again.
